  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name)
      The Player function is a constructor for the Player class. It takes in a String name and sets it as the player's name, sets their score to 0, and creates an ArrayList of Tiles called playerTiles.
      Parameters:
      name - String Set the name of the player

      public List<Tile> getTiles()
      The getTiles function returns a list of the tiles that are currently in the player's hand.
